Kwanseok Choi

Ph.D. Student

Electrical and Computer Engineering

Seoul National University

Email: kwanseok.choi@snu.ac.kr

I am a Ph.D. student in Electrical and Computer Engineering at Seoul National University, advised by Prof. Jaewoong Sim. I am also a member of the Computer Architecture and Systems Lab.

My research interests are in designing efficient systems for emerging workloads. I work on building systems that leverage new technologies like CXL. I also work on accelerator designs for Generative AI.

I received my B.S. degree from Seoul National University (2022).
